title: How to  restore CPE to defualt settings
answer:
(1) You may press and hold the RESET button on the side of the BM632 for over eight seconds to restore the default configuration
(2) You can open the page of “Maintain > Device > Reset”, then click the “Restore Default Configuration”
(3) The WiMAX parameters for access network, WAN, and VoIP parameters must be set again after the default configuration are restored. Otherwise, the CPE can not work properly if the customized parameters was not preset
